name: AbdominalAorticImagingCPT
title: Abdominal aortic imaging CPT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: CT, MRI and ultrasound imaging orders that would include an assessment for abdominal aortic aneurysm.),(Data Element Scope: IMAGING: ORDER),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes for such imaging.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
